ovdesc.p: AZ AZ.ACCT.BAL This file is used to hold the different types of repayment balances in an AZ account. This is a live file and updated with AZ account number as the key. The balances are updated in association with the effective date.
This field holds the interest amount collected on the corresponding date available in the DATE field.

This field holds the interest amount which is received in advance. In an AZ loan contract, when an interest payment is made, the excess amount received will be parked in a sub account and this field would get updated with the excess amount. During next interest payment, the sub account would be debited and this field would be updated based on the remaining amount in the sub account. This field is used only if PROCESS.IRA field in AZ.PRODUCT.PARAMETER application is set to YES. .

This field holds the amount to be collected for penalty due to the defaulting of deposits of repayment type SAVINGS-PLAN. Penal charge entries would be raised on the date available in the field PEN.DATE

This field holds the charge code which is used to raise the penal charges for the defaulting of deposits of repayment type SAVINGS-PLAN. This penal charge will be collected on the date available in the field PEN.DATE

This field holds a date on which penal entries are raised for the defaulting of deposits of repayment type SAVINGS-PLAN. On this date, penal entries are raised based on the corresponding charge code and charge amount available in the fields PEN.CHG.CODE and PEN.CHG.AMT.

AZ. ACCT. BAL PRINCIPAL This field contains the amount of repayment made towards principal. The balance in this field and the balance in the Principal field of AZ.ACCOUNT when combined will be equal to the ORIG. PRINCIPAL field.
This field holds the AZ Sub account which is created for a deposit in a multi deposit with repayment type SAVINGS-PLAN. The corresponding deposit amount is updated in the field TYPE.B

This field holds the individual deposit amounts which comprises of a multi deposit of repayment type SAVINGS-PLAN. This field is updated whenever a sub account is created and deposit is booked. The corresponding sub account created for this deposit amount is updated in the field SUB.ACCT.
AZ. ACCT. BAL ACCOUNT.NUMBER The ID of this live file can be a customer account only. Updated with whenever repayments are made on the AZ main a/c after draw down..

This field holds the total charge amount collected from the AZ account. This field is updated with the new total charge amount whenever any charge is collected from the AZ account. Individual charge amounts and the charge liquidation accounts are updated in CHG.AMOUNT and CHG.LIQ.ACCT fields respectively.

This field holds the charge amount collected from the AZ account. This field is updated with the charge amount for every individual charge with corresponding charge liquidation account in the field CHG.LIQ.ACCT.
The customer account debited for the charge collection. For every individual charge, this field is updated along with the corresponding CHG.AMOUNT field.

"This field holds the amount which is the sum of the principal, interest and charge amounts repaid in this AZ account. The amounts from the fields PRINCIPAL, INTEREST and CHARGES of this record are used to arrive at this consolidated balance. "

This field holds the details of the record in AZ.ACCT.BAL.HIST file. Whenever a record is moved to AZ.ACCT.BAL.HIST file, this field will be updated with the date of the movement and sequence number. .
This field holds the currency of the AZ account for which this record is created.
This field holds the effective date on which the associated balances got changed

This field holds the interest amount which is adjusted from the suspense account due to the interest payment amount lesser than the accrued interest amount. In ANNUITY or CREDIT-CARD type loan accounts, it is possible to make an interest payment less than the accrued interest. In this case, suspense account from the class AZINTADJ would be debited for the remaining amount and this field would get updated. This suspense account would be settled during subsequent payments. This field is used only if LOAN.INT.ADJUST field in AZ.PRODUCT.PARAMETER record is set to YES
Holds the FT.COMMISSION.TYPE or FT.CHARGE.TYPE reference associated with the charge amount
